languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, если у вас есть указания — сообщите сейчас. Когда мы вступим в бой, связь может быть полностью утрачена".
"Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, если у вас есть указания — сообщите сейчас. Когда мы вступим в бой, связь может быть полностью утрачена".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, if you have any instructions, now is the time to provide them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."
"Lord Captain, if you have any instructions, now is the time to provide them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."
"Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."
"Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."
"Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, si vous avez des ordres à nous donner, faites-le maintenant. Nous perdrons sans doute la liaison quand nous attaquerons l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, si vous avez des ordres à nous donner, faites-le maintenant. Nous perdrons sans doute la liaison quand nous attaquerons l'ennemi. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wenn Ihr noch letzte Befehle habt, wäre nun der rechte Zeitpunkt, sie zu erteilen. Die Verbindung könnte vollständig verlorengehen, wenn wir den Feind angreifen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wenn Ihr noch letzte Befehle habt, wäre nun der rechte Zeitpunkt, sie zu erteilen. Die Verbindung könnte vollständig verlorengehen, wenn wir den Feind angreifen."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, si quiere dar una última orden, dígala ahora. Es posible que se pierda la conexión cuando iniciemos el ataque».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, si quiere dar una última orden, dígala ahora. Es posible que se pierda la conexión cuando iniciemos el ataque».

languages.text: “舰长大人，如果您还有什么最后的命令，现在就下达吧。一会儿与敌人交战期间，我们可能会与您彻底失去联系。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，如果您还有什么最后的命令，现在就下达吧。一会儿与敌人交战期间，我们可能会与您彻底失去联系。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、最後にご命令があるなら、お願いします。敵との交戦中は、接続が完全に失われるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、最後にご命令があるなら、お願いします。敵との交戦中は、接続が完全に失われるかもしれません」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, son olarak vereceğiniz emirler varsa onları vermenin tam sırası. Düşmanla çatışmaya girdiğimizde bağlantı tamamen kaybedilebilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you have any last commands, now is the time to give them. The connection may be completely lost when we engage the enemy."
